level.heading: Enforcement.
level.text: Rights and protections provided in this chapter shall not be construed to create new causes of action for monetary damages beyond those that currently exist in federal and local law.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 215 of Mental Health Service Delivery Reform Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-144, October 23, 2001, 48 DCR 9947).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 14-56, see notes following ยง 7-1231.01.
